src:
Kozarev demantovao da Beograd ne priznaje diplome s Kosova

06 Nov 2019, 19:45

Zamenik direktora Kancelarije Vlade Srbije za Kosovo, Dušan Kozarev, demantovao je danas izjavu kandidata za premijera Kosova Aljbina Kurtija da Beograd ne priznaje diplome s Kosova.Kozarev je rekao da je priznato 75 odsto diploma čiji su zahtevi stigli do 2016. godine."Beograd treba da u ovom polju insistira na reciprocitetu, budući da u istom periodu (od 2016. godine) od strane Prištine nije priznata nijedna diploma ustanova iz obrazovnog sistema Srbije", naveo je Kozarev u pisanoj izjavi.Priština je, kako je Kozarev istakao, odbila da prihvati spisak univerziteta Srbije i da prizna Prištinski univerzitet s privremenim sedištem u Кosovskoj Mitrovici, zbog čega je i priznavanje diploma od strane Srbije obustavljeno."Kurti bi trebalo da makar pročita sporazume postignute u Briselu pre no što odluči da ih komentariše, i da se raspita kod svojih kolega u Prištini o tome kako su i kada sve kršili dogovore", rekao je on.
text:
Kozarev denied that Belgrade did not recognize diplomas from Kosovo

06 Nov 2019, 18:45

The Deputy Director of the Government Office for Kosovo, Dusan Kozarev, today denied a statement by Kosovo Prime Ministerial candidate Albin Kurti that Belgrade does not recognize diplomas from Kosovo.Kozarev said 75 percent of the diplomas whose applications arrived by 2016 were recognized. that in this field he insists on reciprocity, since during the same period (from 2016), no diplomas of institutions from the Serbian educational system were recognized by Pristina, "Kozarev said in a written statement. Pristina, as Kozarev pointed out, denied that accept the list of universities of Serbia and recognize the University of Prishtina with a temporary seat in Kosovska Mitrovica, which is why the recognition of diplomas by Serbia is suspended. "Kurti should at least read the agreements reached in Brussels before deciding to comment on them, and inquire to his colleagues in Pristina about how and when they broke the arrangements, "he said.
